t1.inquire: Does your practice have hours outside of standard business hours?

t2.inquire: Do you survey your patients for their experiences?

t3.inquire: Does your team have daily huddle meetings?

t5.inquire: Do you do any other Behavioral screenings?

t6.inquire: Do you have a Patient Portal?

t7.inquire: Do your patients use your Portal to request refills?

t8.inquire: Do your patients use your Portal to make appointments?

t9.inquire: Do your patients use your Portal to ask Clinical Questions?

t10.inquire: Do you receive QUARR/HEDIS lists from the insurance companies?

t11.inquire: Do you contact patients about services they are due to receive?

t12.inquire: How do you keep track of patients you've called?

t13.inquire: When patients call with clinical questions, where do you write it down?

t14.inquire: Do you monitor how long patients wait for a call back?

t15.inquire: Does your front desk help patients make appointments for imaging?

t16.inquire: Do you follow up on imaging results that are late coming back?

t17.inquire: Does your front desk help patients make appointments for referrals?

t18.inquire: Do you follow up on referral results that are late coming back?

t19.inquire: Do you have set expectations for when you should receive reports from specialists?

t20.inquire: Do you talk to local hospitals and ERs when your patients are admitted?

t21.inquire: Do the ERs call about your patients to confirm medications and care plans?

t22.inquire: Do you note those calls in the patient charts?

t23.inquire: When patients tell you that they were at the hospital or Urgent Care facility, do you ask them for the discharge documents?

t24.inquire: If they don't have the discharge info, do you get it from the other provider?

t25.inquire: Do you tend to prescribe more generics or brands?

t26.inquire: Do you keep a list of community resources for your patients?

t27.inquire: Do you have a suggestion box for patients?

t28.inquire: Do you provide patients with Advance Proxy documents and counseling?

t29.inquire: Do you submit to an official immunization database?

t30.inquire: Do you offer educational materials written in plain-english to your patients?

t31.inquire: Do you use tools of shared-decision-making?
